name: Fort Washington Investment Advisors
overview: Alignment of interest - Fort Washington’s parent company, Western & Southern Financial Group, has substantial capital in many of the strategies in which Fort Washington’s clients are invested. Client-focused - Fort Washington is centered on the interests of its clients. Client’s interests come first. Multi-strategy firm with good performance track records - Fort Washington offers many strategies in public equity, fixed income and private equity. Many of these strategies share a common objective to outperform over a full market cycle, sticking with their philosophies and processes during times of uncertainty.รยน Culture of risk control and mitigation - At the core of Fort Washington’s investment strategies is an acute sense of risk and a priority of seeking to protect client’s portfolios on the downside. Collegial and collaborative teams - Fort Washington has attracted the quality of professionals and staff needed for success who are willing to make a long-term commitment to the organization. Our collegial environment encourages teamwork at every level.

funding_round.source_description: TruTouch Technologies Closes $1.3M Venture Capital Funding Round
